output:
You look at me, I'm looking at you Your face lights up with a smile so right
I can see it in your eyes, what you've been through before
But don't let that stop you baby, open that door
I will spend my time with you, I would love to be with you
So now's the time to turn it around, so take my hand we'll make it tonight
Maybe I've learned how I can get it right, with a girl like you, I have changed
I will spend my time with you, I would love to be with you
If I could make you mine tonight, I'm a pretty boy and I treat you right
So now's the time to head towards your way, take charge baby and steal you away
I will spend my time with you, I would love to be with you
